tmp

Class ModifiedLWPageUtilities

  • java.lang.Object
    • tmp.ModifiedLWPageUtilities

  • public final class ModifiedLWPageUtilities
extends java.lang.Object
    Melting pot for all lightweight page utilities needed across the XLT engine.
    Author:
    Hartmut Arlt (Xceptance Software Technologies GmbH)
